title: Engineering Manager - Artifact, Build, and Source team
overview: The Engineering Manager - Artifact, Build, and Source team position at Netflix involves defining strategies for improving source code management and continuous integration offerings, leading through change, and driving a product vision by leveraging cross-functional partnerships.
description:

At Netflix, we empower developers to take ownership and handle their creations throughout the entire software development lifecycle. We scale this approach through substantial investments in developer tooling, streamlining, and automating DevOps to minimize repetitive tasks.

Within the Developer Platform organization, the Artifact, Build, and Source teamâ€™s mission is to provide Netflix Engineers with the tooling, infrastructure, and best practices required to efficiently and securely take source code through the build, test, and publication phases of the software development lifecycle.Â 
The Opportunity
The Artifact, Build, and Source team was recently formed through a combination of two closely related but previously separate teams. Youâ€™ll complete their integration by defining a new team charter and mapping out strategies to address the following three domains:

Source Code Management
Provide approachable and productive solutions for source code storage and distribution, source code search, and code review for thousands of Netflix Engineers around the world.

Build Infrastructure
Provide language-agnostic build infrastructure such as Continuous Integration, build metadata and diagnostics APIs, distributed build caches, and more.Â 

Artifact publication and distribution

extras.title: What You Will Do
content: Define strategies for improving the productivity and user experience of our source code management and continuous integration offerings.
Define how we measure the success and effectiveness of our products and drive the execution and continuous evaluation of those metrics.
Create strong partnerships with Netflix engineers by creating continuous feedback loops that allow us to understand their problems better and address them in a highly leveraged manner.
Ensure that our product evolution thoughtfully addresses product lifecycle and adoption/migration experience and provides clear guidance and recommendations to your teams.
